section.name: SettingsPages
section.p: On the left you can select which page of settings to view.
* [b]General[/b] settings allow you to configure paths that the program should include in the [b]Resource Browser[/b] tab of the [b]Design Screen[/b]
* [b]3D Viewport[/b] lets you configure viewport navigation keys, invert the Y-axis, and set speeds of movement
* [b]User Flags[/b] contains the customizable flag names used by permutations
* [b]Shortcuts[/b] is where the accelerator keys for different commands are configured. [b]CTRL + SPACEBAR[/b] to open the [b]Quick Action[/b] menu is not configurable.

section.name: Licenses
section.p: You can also read the licenses of 3rd party software used by SprueTex as well as the software EULA itself here in the [b]Settings[/b] screen.

section.name: SettingName
section.p: For each setting the name of it will be displayed above the widget for editing it.

section.name: SettingDescription
section.p: A brief synopsis of what the setting is found to the right of the setting's name.
